original_text: But you should not be like that. The person who wants to be great among you must become your servant.
korean_text: 너희 중에는 그렇지 않아야 하나니 너희 중에 누구든지 크고자 하는 자는 너희를 섬기는 자가 되고

sentences.original_text: But you should not be like that
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너희는 그렇게 되어서는 안 된다

sentences.original_text: The person who wants to be great
among you must become your servant
